name: Puzzle Up (mucoffeeg)
description:
Puzzle Up is a 3D match 3 or more puzzle game. 

Gameplay is simple, a random tile that contains data between 1 to 6 is generated (after you reach score of 150, 1 to 7 is generated). You click on one of the four columns to push tile to the playground. If you connect 3 or more same tiles they will be destroyed and you get score points.

Note: There may be some errors on Safari. But there are no errors on Chrome.
